definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: This is my third visit in just over two years as Secretary-General of the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 这是我担任联合国秘书长两年多来的第三次访问。

sentences.english: At 10 a. m. next day, Secretary-general Yao Haitao met Ms.
sentences.chinese: 次日上午10时，姚海涛秘书长亲切会见了陆洁女士。

sentences.english: Sheng Maolin, secretary-general of Hunan Province, and heads from related departments directly under the province participated in the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 省政府秘书长盛茂林，省直相关部门负责人参加调研。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki- moon has also extended his condolences.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文也对巴西火灾遇难者表示哀悼。

sentences.english: The Secretary-General has taken action in all areas of reform under his authority.
sentences.chinese: 秘书长已在受其管辖的全部改革领域采取行动。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon sent a congratulatory message to the conference.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文向大会发来贺信。

sentences.english: NATO Secretary-General Jaap de Hoop Scheffer announced the decision.
sentences.chinese: 北约秘书长夏侯雅伯宣布了这一决定。

sentences.english: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon described the queen as an anchor for our age.
sentences.chinese: 联合国秘书长潘基文称女王为这个时代的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: C. Mr Francesco Frangialli, Secretary-General of the World Tourism Organization.
sentences.chinese: 世界旅游组织秘书长弗朗加利先生。

sentences.english: Jiamusi " Cavalry Camp" Bicycle Club, the Secretary-General.
sentences.chinese: 佳木斯“骑兵营”自行车俱乐部秘书长讲话。

sentences.english: UN Under-Secretary-General for Disarmament Affairs Nobuyasu Abe attended and addressed the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 联合国副秘书长阿部信泰出席开幕式并致辞。

sentences.english: They shall refrain from any action which might reflect on their position as international officials responsible only to the Organization.
sentences.chinese: 秘书长应向大会提送关于本组织工作之常年报告。

sentences.english: The United Nations report was prepared for Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.
sentences.chinese: 这份联合国报告是为联合国秘书长潘基文准备的。

sentences.english: DSG receives the decorated cans already necked in, he says.
sentences.chinese: 常务副秘书长收到装饰已领罐中，他说。

sentences.english: Thank you, deputy secretary-general, Mr. Cao Weizhou.
" asked Lu Mai, secretary-general of the China Development Research Foundation.
sentences.chinese: 中国发展基金研究会秘书长卢迈说。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
president of a club, committee etc
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
